tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medication_allergies (
	patient_id INTEGER,
	allergy_name VARCHAR(255),
	allergy_type VARCHAR(50),
	recorded_date DATE,
	severity VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientMedicationAllergies ( 
  patient_id INT, 
  medication_id INT, 
  allergy_id INT, 
  PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, medication_id, allergy_id), 
  FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES Medications(medication_id), 
  FOREIGN KEY (allergy_id) REFERENCES Allergies(allergy_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts ( 
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  alert_message TEXT NOT NULL, 
  alert_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
  patient_id INT NOT NULL, 
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES PatientMedicationAllergies(patient_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    medication_allergies VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE medication_list (
    medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR,
    medication_description VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE medication_allergy (
    allergy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    medication_id INT,
    allergy_description VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_info(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medication_list(medication_id)
)

CREATE TABLE allergy_alert (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    medication_id INT,
    alert_message VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_info(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medication_list(medication_id)
)

CREATE TABLE alert_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_id INT,
    alert_date TIMESTAMP,
    alert_status VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (alert_id) REFERENCES allergy_alert(alert_id)
)
